meanings.definition: A three-dimensional surface that can be formed by rotating a hyperbola around its axis.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a small hyperboloid sculpture for the exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The architect used a hyperboloid shape for the design of the new building.
meanings.sent3: The hyperboloid cake looked so realistic that guests thought it was a sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared like a hyperboloid, reaching new heights every night.
meanings.sent5: The hyperboloid structure stood out among the other geometric shapes in the park.

meanings.definition: A geometric shape resembling a hyperbola.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about the hyperboloid in their math class.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a hyperboloid as inspiration for the painting.
meanings.sent3: The hyperboloid balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in waves, forming a hyperboloid shape.
meanings.sent5: The hyperboloid pattern on the fabric added a modern touch to the dress.
